   21: -module(httpc_cookie_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   27: -compile(export_all).
   28: 
   29: -define(URL,        "http://myhost.cookie.test.org").
   30: -define(URL_DOMAIN, "http://myhost2.cookie.test.org").
   31: -define(URL_SECURE, "https://myhost.cookie.test.org").
   32: 
   33: %% Test server callback functions
   34: 
   35: suite() -> 
   36:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   37:      {timetrap,{seconds,15}}
   38:     ].
   39: 
   40: all() -> 
   41:     [
   42:      session_cookies_only, 
   43:      netscape_cookies, 
   44:      cookie_cancel,
   45:      cookie_expires, 
   46:      persistent_cookie, 
   47:      domain_cookie,
   48:      secure_cookie, 
   49:      update_cookie, 
   50:      update_cookie_session,
   51:      cookie_attributes
   52:     ].
   53: 
   54: groups() -> 
   55:     [].
   56: 
   57: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   67:     Config.
   68: 
   69: init_per_testcase(session_cookies_only = Case, Config0) ->
   70:     Config = init_workdir(Case, Config0), 
   71:     application:start(inets), 
   72:     httpc:set_options([{cookies, verify}]),
   73:     Config;
   74: init_per_testcase(cookie_expires = Case, Config0) ->
   75:     Config = init_workdir(Case, Config0), 
   76:     CaseDir = proplists:get_value(case_top_dir, Config),
   77:     application:start(inets), 
   78:     application:set_env(inets, services, [{httpc, {default, CaseDir}}]),
   79:     application:start(inets), 
   80:     httpc:set_options([{cookies, verify}]),
   81:     Config;
   82: init_per_testcase(Case, Config0) ->
   83:     Config = init_workdir(Case, Config0), 
   84:     CaseDir = proplists:get_value(case_top_dir, Config),
   85:     application:load(inets),
   86:     application:set_env(inets, services, [{httpc, {default, CaseDir}}]),
   87:     application:start(inets), 
   88:     httpc:set_options([{cookies, verify}]),
   89:     Config.
   90: 
   91: init_workdir(Case, Config) ->
   92:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   93:     SuiteTopDir = filename:join(PrivDir, ?MODULE),
   94:     case file:make_dir(SuiteTopDir) of
   95:         ok ->
   96:             ok;
   97:         {error, eexist} ->
   98:             ok;
   99:         Error ->
  100:            ct:fail({failed_creating_subsuite_top_dir, Error})
  101:     end,
  102: 
  103:     CaseTopDir = filename:join(SuiteTopDir, Case),
  104:     ok   = file:make_dir(CaseTopDir),
  105:     [{suite_top_dir, SuiteTopDir}, 
  106:      {case_top_dir,  CaseTopDir} | Config].
  107: 
  108: end_per_testcase(_, _) ->
  109:     application:stop(inets).
  110: 
  111: 
  112: %% Test cases starts here.
  113: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  114: session_cookies_only() -> 
  115:     [{doc, "Test that all cookies are handled as session cookies if there"
  116:      "does not exist a directory to save presitent cookies in."}].
  117: session_cookies_only(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  118:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/;" 
  119: 			 ";max-age=60000"}],
  120:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  121:     {"cookie", "$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/"} = 
  122: 	httpc:cookie_header(?URL),
  123:     application:stop(inets),
  124:     application:start(inets),
  125:     {"cookie", ""} = httpc:cookie_header(?URL).
  126: 
  127: netscape_cookies() -> 
  128:     [{doc, "Test that the old (original) format of cookies are accepted."}].
  129: netscape_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  130:     Expires = future_netscape_date(),
  131:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/; " 
  132: 			 "expires=" ++ Expires}],
  133:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  134:     {"cookie", "$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/"} = 
  135: 	httpc:cookie_header(?URL).
  136: 
  137: cookie_cancel() -> 
  138:     [{doc, "A cookie can be canceld by sending the same cookie with max-age=0 "
  139:      "this test checks that cookie is canceled."}].
  140: cookie_cancel(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  141:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/;" 
  142: 			 "max-age=60000"}],
  143:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  144:     {"cookie", "$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/"} = 
  145: 	httpc:cookie_header(?URL),
  146:     NewSetCookieHeaders = 
  147: 	[{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/;max-age=0"}],
  148:     httpc:store_cookies(NewSetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  149:     {"cookie", ""} = httpc:cookie_header(?URL).
  150: 
  151: cookie_expires() -> 
  152:     [{doc, "Test that a cookie is not used when it has expired"}].
  153: cookie_expires(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  154:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/;" 
  155: 			 "max-age=5"}],
  156:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  157:     {"cookie", "$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/"} = 
  158: 	httpc:cookie_header(?URL),
  159:     timer:sleep(10000),
  160:     {"cookie", ""} = httpc:cookie_header(?URL).
  161: 
  162: persistent_cookie() ->
  163:     [{doc, "Test domain cookie attribute"}].
  164: persistent_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  165:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/;" 
  166: 			 "max-age=60000"}],
  167:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  168:     {"cookie", "$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/"} = 
  169: 	httpc:cookie_header(?URL),
  170:     CaseDir = proplists:get_value(case_top_dir, Config),
  171:     application:stop(inets),
  172:     application:load(inets),
  173:     application:set_env(inets, services, [{httpc, {default, CaseDir}}]),
  174:     application:start(inets), 
  175:     httpc:set_options([{cookies, enabled}]),
  176:     {"cookie","$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/"} = httpc:cookie_header(?URL).
  177: 
  178: domain_cookie() ->
  179:     [{doc, "Test the domain cookie attribute"}].
  180: domain_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  181:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/;" 
  182: 			 "domain=.cookie.test.org"}],
  183:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  184:     {"cookie","$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/; "
  185:      "$Domain=.cookie.test.org"} = 
  186: 	httpc:cookie_header(?URL_DOMAIN).
  187: 
  188: secure_cookie() ->
  189:     [{doc, "Test the secure cookie attribute"}].
  190: secure_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  191:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/; secure"}],
  192:     ok = httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  193:     check_cookie("$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/", ?URL_SECURE), 
  194:     check_cookie("", ?URL),
  195:     SetCookieHeaders1 = [{"set-cookie", "test1_cookie=true; path=/; secure"}],
  196:     ok = httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders1, ?URL),
  197:     check_cookie("$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/; "
  198: 		 "test1_cookie=true; $Path=/",
  199: 		 ?URL_SECURE).
  200:     
  201: update_cookie()->
  202:     [{doc, "Test that a (plain) cookie can be updated."}].
  203: update_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  204:     print_cookies("Cookies before store"),
  205: 
  206:     SetCookieHeaders = 
  207: 	[{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/; max-age=6500"},
  208: 	 {"set-cookie", "test_cookie2=true; path=/; max-age=6500"}],
  209:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  210:     print_cookies("Cookies after first store"),
  211:     ExpectCookie1 = 
  212: 	"$Version=0; "
  213: 	"test_cookie=true; $Path=/; "
  214: 	"test_cookie2=true; $Path=/", 
  215:     expect_cookie_header(1, ExpectCookie1), 
  216: 
  217:     NewSetCookieHeaders = 
  218: 	[{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=false; path=/; max-age=6500"}],
  219:     httpc:store_cookies(NewSetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  220:     print_cookies("Cookies after second store"),    
  221:     ExpectCookie2 = 
  222: 	"$Version=0; "
  223: 	"test_cookie2=true; $Path=/; "
  224: 	"test_cookie=false; $Path=/", 
  225:     expect_cookie_header(2, ExpectCookie2).
  226: 
  227: update_cookie_session()->
  228:     [{doc, "Test that a session cookie can be updated."}].
  229: update_cookie_session(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  230:     print_cookies("Cookies before store"),
  231: 
  232:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true; path=/"},
  233: 			{"set-cookie", "test_cookie2=true; path=/"}],
  234:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  235:     print_cookies("Cookies after first store"),
  236:     ExpectedCookie1 = 
  237: 	"$Version=0; test_cookie=true; $Path=/; test_cookie2=true; $Path=/",
  238:     expect_cookie_header(1, ExpectedCookie1), 
  239: 
  240:     NewSetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=false; path=/"}],
  241:     httpc:store_cookies(NewSetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  242:     print_cookies("Cookies after second store"),    
  243:     ExpectedCookie2 = 
  244: 	"$Version=0; test_cookie2=true; $Path=/; test_cookie=false; $Path=/", 
  245:     expect_cookie_header(2, ExpectedCookie2).
  246:     
  247: 
  248: cookie_attributes() -> 
  249:     [{doc, "Test attribute not covered by the other test cases"}].
  250: cookie_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  251:     SetCookieHeaders = [{"set-cookie", "test_cookie=true;version=1;"
  252: 			 "comment=foobar; "%% Comment
  253: 			 "foo=bar;" %% Nonsense should be ignored
  254: 			 "max-age=60000"}],
  255:     httpc:store_cookies(SetCookieHeaders, ?URL),
  256:     {"cookie","$Version=1; test_cookie=true"} = httpc:cookie_header(?URL).
  257: 
  258: 
  259: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  260: %%% Internal functions
  261: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  262: print_cookies(Pre) ->
  263:     io:format("~s: ", [Pre]),
  264:     print_cookies2(httpc:which_cookies()).
  265: 
  266: print_cookies2([]) ->
  267:     ok;
  268: print_cookies2([{cookies, Cookies}|Rest]) ->
  269:     print_cookies3("Cookies", Cookies),
  270:     print_cookies2(Rest);
  271: print_cookies2([{session_cookies, Cookies}|Rest]) ->
  272:     print_cookies3("Session Cookies", Cookies),
  273:     print_cookies2(Rest);
  274: print_cookies2([_|Rest]) ->
  275:     print_cookies2(Rest).
  276: 
  277: print_cookies3(Header, []) ->
  278:     io:format("   ~s: []", [Header]);
  279: print_cookies3(Header, Cookies) ->
  280:     io:format("   ~s: ", [Header]),
  281:     Prefix      = "      ", 
  282:     PrintCookie = 
  283: 	fun(Cookie) -> 
  284: 		io:format("~s", [httpc_cookie:image_of(Prefix, Cookie)]) 
  285: 	end, 
  286:     lists:foreach(PrintCookie, Cookies).
  287: 
  288: expect_cookie_header(No, ExpectedCookie) ->
  289:     case httpc:cookie_header(?URL) of
  290: 	{"cookie", ExpectedCookie} ->
  291: 	    ok;
  292:     	{"cookie", BadCookie} ->
  293: 	    io:format("Bad Cookie ~w: "
  294: 		      "~n   Expected: ~s"
  295: 		      "~n   Received: ~s"
  296: 		      "~n", [No, ExpectedCookie, BadCookie]),
  297: 	    exit({bad_cookie_header, No, ExpectedCookie, BadCookie})
  298:     end.
  299: 
  300: check_cookie(Expect, URL) ->
  301:     case httpc:cookie_header(URL) of
  302: 	{"cookie", Expect} ->
  303: 	    ok;
  304: 	{"cookie", Unexpected} ->
  305: 	    case lists:prefix(Expect, Unexpected) of
  306: 		true ->
  307: 		    Extra = Unexpected -- Expect, 
  308: 		    ct:fail({extra_cookie_info, Extra});
  309: 		false ->
  310: 		    ct:fail({unknown_cookie, Expect, Unexpected})
  311: 	    end;
  312: 	Bad ->
  313: 	    ct:fail({bad_cookies, Bad})
  314:     end.
  315: 
  316: 
  317: future_netscape_date() ->
  318:     [Day, DD, Mon, YYYY] = netscape_date(date()),
  319:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~s, ~s ~s ~s 12:30:00 GMT", 
  320: 				[Day, DD, Mon, YYYY])).
  321: 
  322: netscape_date({Year, 12, _}) ->
  323:     NewYear = Year + 1,
  324:     NewMonth = 1,
  325:     NewDay = calendar:last_day_of_the_month(NewYear, NewMonth),
  326:     WeekDay = calendar:day_of_the_week(NewYear, NewMonth, NewDay),
  327:     WeekDayNrStr = day_nr_str(NewDay), 
  328:     NewDayStr = week_day_str(WeekDay),
  329:     MonthStr = month_str(NewMonth),
  330:     [NewDayStr, WeekDayNrStr, MonthStr, integer_to_list(NewYear)];
  331: 
  332: netscape_date({Year, Month, _})  ->
  333:     NewMonth = Month + 1,
  334:     NewDay = calendar:last_day_of_the_month(Year, NewMonth),
  335:     WeekDay = calendar:day_of_the_week(Year, NewMonth, NewDay),
  336:     WeekDayNrStr = day_nr_str(NewDay), 
  337:     NewDayStr = week_day_str(WeekDay),
  338:     MonthStr = month_str(NewMonth),
  339:     [NewDayStr, WeekDayNrStr, MonthStr, integer_to_list(Year)].
  340: 
  341: week_day_str(1) ->
  342:     "Mon";
  343: week_day_str(2) ->
  344:     "Tus";
  345: week_day_str(3) ->
  346:     "Wdy";
  347: week_day_str(4) ->
  348:     "Thu";
  349: week_day_str(5) ->
  350:     "Fri";
  351: week_day_str(6) ->
  352:     "Sat";
  353: week_day_str(7) ->
  354:     "Sun".
  355: 
  356: day_nr_str(1) ->
  357:     "01";
  358: day_nr_str(2) ->
  359:     "02";
  360: day_nr_str(3) ->
  361:     "03";
  362: day_nr_str(4) ->
  363:     "04";
  364: day_nr_str(5) ->
  365:     "05";
  366: day_nr_str(6) ->
  367:     "06";
  368: day_nr_str(7) ->
  369:     "07";
  370: day_nr_str(8) ->
  371:     "08";
  372: day_nr_str(0) ->
  373:     "09";
  374: day_nr_str(N) ->
  375:     integer_to_list(N).
  376: 
  377: month_str(1) ->"Jan";
  378: month_str(2) ->"Feb";
  379: month_str(3) ->"Mar"; 
  380: month_str(4) ->"Apr";
  381: month_str(5) ->"May";
  382: month_str(6) ->"Jun";
  383: month_str(7) ->"Jul";
  384: month_str(8) ->"Aug";
  385: month_str(9) ->"Sep";
  386: month_str(10) ->"Oct";
  387: month_str(11) ->"Nov";
  388: month_str(12) ->"Dec".
  389: 
  390:
